# ExportPageSize

The paper size of the export PDF file. The `size` attribute is only supported for Documents (Canva Docs).

## Enum

* `A4` (value: `'a4'`)

* `A3` (value: `'a3'`)

* `LETTER` (value: `'letter'`)

* `LEGAL` (value: `'legal'`)
